com.wingman.client.api.net

Class HttpClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.squareup.okhttp.OkHttpClient
      • com.wingman.client.api.net.HttpClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class HttpClient
extends com.squareup.okhttp.OkHttpClient
    HttpClient contains the recommended API for handling web requests.
    It utilizes the OkHttpClient library for efficient request handling.
    Request caching is not enabled by default because of potential file conflict in the event of multiple client instances being run at the same time.

                    java.nio.file.Path savePath)

        Parameters:
        url - the URL of the file
        savePath - the save path of the downloaded file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the download failed

      • downloadUrlSync

        public com.squareup.okhttp.Response downloadUrlSync(java.lang.String url)
                                             throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs a synchronous request to the URL specified.
        Returns Response upon completion.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL of your request
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the download failed

      • downloadUrlAsync

        public void downloadUrlAsync(java.lang.String url,
                    com.squareup.okhttp.Callback callback)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs an asynchronous request to the URL specified, and places it on the OkHttp worker thread.
        The instance of Callback specified in the arguments is called upon completion of the request.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL of your request
        callback - the Callback called after request completion
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the download failed

        public com.squareup.okhttp.Request.Builder getRequestBuilder()
        Constructs a Request.Builder with request headers attempting to mimic a real browser.
